entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Fort Erie
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
